abstract: Reverts a document to the most recent document data stored on-disk.

declaration.code: func revert(toContentsOf url: URL, completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil)

overview:
## Discussion

You call this method to discard all unsaved document modifications and replace the document’s contents by reading the file or file package located by `url`. The default implementation brackets the reversion operation between [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/disableEditing()] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/enableEditing()]because the document shouldn’t accept user changes during this period. Subclasses that override this method must call the superclass implementation (`super`) or use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator] class to initiate a coordinated read.

# revert(toContentsOf:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Reverts a document to the most recent document data stored on-disk.

## Declaration

```swift
func revert(toContentsOf url: URL, completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func revert(toContentsOf url: URL) async -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **url**: A file URL locating the most recent version of the document file in the application’s sandbox.
- **completionHandler**: A block with code to execute after the reversion operation concludes. The block returns no value and has one parameter:



The block is invoked on the main queue.

## Discussion

You call this method to discard all unsaved document modifications and replace the document’s contents by reading the file or file package located by `url`. The default implementation brackets the reversion operation between [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/disableEditing()] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/enableEditing()]because the document shouldn’t accept user changes during this period. Subclasses that override this method must call the superclass implementation (`super`) or use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator] class to initiate a coordinated read.
title: revert(toContentsOf:completionHandler:)
